name: Madness Mathematica
description:
A weird pseudo educational fantasy math game...??? *headscratch*

Instructions
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Down to drop through platforms
  • Up / Space to jump
  • Number keys (1-4) to select your answer

Made using Gamemaker and Bfxr
Music from Incompetech
Batty McFaddin Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Creator's note: I certainly didn't intend the game to turn out this
way, it wasn't even supposed to resemble anything mathsy or
educational... but it just kinda did, because of my zero artistic
ability and time and resource constraints. So if you find yourself
having some kind of sadistic perverse fun with my weird creation, let me
know in the comments :)
